items.name: 6 Pack / Into The Haze
items.desc:
Into The Haze 6.2%, our IPA. This is a soft, juicy India Pale Ale totally soaked with beautiful tropical fruit hop aromatics. Bright, intense, luscious mouthfeel and texture – delicious!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! Couriers are experiencing unprecedented demand and it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Senescence
items.desc:
Senescence 6.5% is a crisp, clean IPA utilising the New Zealand hops Nelson Sauvin and Motueka!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Maximum of 12 cans per box.
Please note that orders are shipped at next day delivery from when you receive an email that we have finished processing your order! Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Something Good 11
items.desc:
Something Good 11 6.2% IPA
The latest in the Something Good Series, number 11 is a Amber IPA. Expect citrus and dank dry hop notes , toe to toe on a layered backdrop of light crystal and biscuit malts.
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! In light of the new lockdown measures we are expecting delivery couriers to be extremely busy, especially in the lead up to Christmas. As a result it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your consideration of this when ordering. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Steady Rolling Man
items.desc:
Steady Rolling Man 5.2%. Our pale ale. Inspired by the ridiculously tasty, hoppy beers we fell for, we got brewing our own versions, over and over again, whilst listening to the blues greats. The heady concoction of old time blues records and juicy American hops transfixed us from the start and the steady rolling man was born in these sessions! Incredibly soft and delicate with intense tropical fruit hop aromatics and saturation, this is our vision of the perfect pale ale.
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service from when you receive an email stating that your order is now completed! Couriers are still experiencing unprecedented demand and it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Tappy Pils
items.desc:
Tappy Pils is 4.4 %, our Pilsner. A crisp, hoppy lager with bready malt character and a long bitter finish. We utilise fresh Saphir and Hersbrucker hops for snappy noble German hop character, and honour time, tradition and patience to create a beautiful, clean Pils. Enjoy!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! In light of the new lockdown measures we are expecting delivery couriers to be extremely busy, especially in the lead up to Christmas. As a result it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your consideration of this when ordering. Shipping to UK mainland only.
